ActApprentice Loans Act
SubjectOrder Approving the Terms and Conditions in Apprentice Loan Agreements
PrecisOrder approving the TERMS AND CONDITIONS of existing and future loan agreements between eligible apprentices and the Minister of Labour for apprentice loans under the Apprentice Loans Act.
